Plot: A young guy short on luck, enrolls in a class to build confidence to help win over the girl of his dreams, which becomes complicated when his teacher has the same agenda.
Title: School for Scoundrels
Actors: Billy Bob Thornton, Jon Heder, Jacinda Barrett, Michael Clarke Duncan
tomatoConsensus: School for Scoundrels squanders its talented cast with a formulaic, unfocused attempt at a romantic comedy that's neither romantic nor funny.
